OrderBLL - Class in Logic
This class implements all CRUD methods for Orders using DAO classes.

OrderItem - Class in Model
The Order Class holds the specific fields for an Order: id, id of the Client, id of the Product and the quantity of the product.

OrderOperations - Class in Presentation
This class implements a window for creating product orders.
OrderOperations() - Constructor for class Presentation.OrderOperations
The constructor creates the window and the default buttons for the operations.
